name: Thornheart Guardian
description: The Thornheart Guardian is a large construct with a thorny exterior, utilized as a sentinel or protector. It features barbed weapons and an imposing physical presence.
memorable: Its ability to create difficult terrain and restrain enemies with magical thorny vines makes it a challenging foe.
goals: The guardian typically exists to protect a location or entity and defeat intruders.
relations: It may be encountered in the service of a powerful creator or within enchanted forests guarding sacred grounds.
environment: Often found in forested areas or locations that require protection.
strengths: Immunity to poison and psychic damage, along with resistance to nonmagical physical attacks, enhances its durability.
weaknesses: Low intelligence limits its tactical capabilities, making it predictable in combat.
attacks: It can unleash three attacks in one turn using a barbed greatsword and a thorny whip, inflicting both slashing and piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: Grasp of the Briar creates difficult terrain and can restrain foes, causing necrotic damage each turn.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 16, making it quite aware of its surroundings.
skills: It has a good perception skill, helping it notice hidden threats.
additional_information: Immunities to charming and paralyzing effects.
Magical attacks allow it to bypass resistances.
Can move through nonmagical plants unhindered.
Recharges its area control ability on a 5-6 roll.
High strength makes it a powerful melee combatant.
test_queries: strong melee combatant with barbed weapons
